description:
Takashi still has not returned. Hayato and Shusuke continue to spend their days filling in for him. Taking Takashi`s place, Hayato attends school and enjoys spending time with Naru. Meanwhile, Shusuke searches for a way to help Hiyoko when someone unexpected shows up at Alexander.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Please, Always Be a Fan, Okay?
Zutto, Fan de Ite Kudasai ne
ずっと, ファンでいてくださいね
